mapper.insert: insert into board_tb(user_id, title, thumbnail, content, created_at) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select bt.id, bt.title, bt.thumbnail, ut.username from board_tb bt inner join user_tb ut on bt.user_id = ut.id order by bt.id desc;
select bt.id, bt.title, bt.content, ut.username, bt.user_id from board_tb bt inner join user_tb ut on bt.user_id = ut.id where bt.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update board_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail} where id = #{id}
